articles.author: Alex Kozul-Wright
articles.title: Gold and Silver Prices Fall Sharply as Trump Picks Warsh as Fed Chair. Here’s Why. - Barron's
articles.content: Gold tumbled early Friday as markets reacted to the news that President Donald Trump has selected Kevin Warsh to replace Jerome Powell as head of the Federal Reserve.
